title: Walk
instructions:
In the last exercise you created a `turn_around` function to tidy up your code.

In this exercise we want you to create a `walk` function that takes a number of steps as its input, and moves forward that many times.

Once you've written your function, the code below will use it alongside `turn_left()` and `turn_right()` to navigate through the maze.
hints: Your function should be called walk and take one input called steps
Use repeat with the steps input to move forward multiple times
The function should call move() inside the repeat loop
